name: Wonder (Cyberpunk Symphonies)
description:
Cover art and Sprites done by Rivlyn and Maddox

Scripting by Ren

Can't go past level one? yeah. I know. Its broken and I dont want to fix it. You cannot leave level 2 unless you use task manager to end the task. That's how unfinished this game is.

The original concept was about growing up, and the player finally accepting reality and leaving their childhood fantasies behind... with some supernatural influence and shenanigans or whatever.

This game will not be updated unless I feel like it tbh. 

#ArnoldSweep
